# Role Specific Rules You are only silicon if the game clearly and explicitly tells you that you are a silicon. For players who are silicons, these Silicon Rules override all roleplay rules if there is any conflict. Silicon Rules do not override core rules.
- [textlink="1. Cyborg / AI" link="RuleS1"] - [textlink="2. Passenger" link="RuleS2"] - [textlink="3. Security" link="RuleS3"] - [textlink="4. Command" link="RuleS4"] - [textlink="5. Insurgents" link="RuleS5"] - [textlink="6. Antagonists" link="RuleS6"]
